item.title: A Structured Workflow for AI-Assisted Development
item.description:
AI coding assistants like Claude and GitHub Copilot are powerful, but ad-hoc usage leads to scattered context, unreproducible results, and lost knowledge. This guide presents a 5-step workflow that transforms AI from a chaotic helper into a reliable, documented part of your development process.

  1. Draft - Capture your task as a rough prompt
  2. Refine - Use AI to transform it into a structured specification
  3. Save - Store with metadata for traceability
  4. Execute - Run the prompt with an AI agent
  5. Update - Document the outcome and iterate

Key Benefits

  • Traceability: Every task is documented with metadata
  • Knowledge Preservation: Prompts become searchable documentation
  • Compounding Context: AI agents learn your project patterns over time
  • Measurable Progress: Track success rates and identify blockers

item.title: Understanding Modern Web Architecture
item.description:
Modern web architecture has evolved significantly over the past decade. In this post, we’ll explore the key principles that drive scalable, maintainable web applications.

The Evolution of Web Architecture

From monolithic applications to microservices, the web development landscape has transformed dramatically. Today’s applications need to handle millions of users while maintaining performance and reliability.

Key Principles

  1. Separation of Concerns - Keep your frontend and backend loosely coupled
  2. Scalability - Design systems that can grow with your user base
  3. Performance - Optimize for speed at every layer
  4. Security - Build security into your architecture from day one

Conclusion

Understanding these principles is essential for any developer looking to build robust, scalable applications.
